0.text: Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity upon casting a basic ability or using  Savagery's first attack. At 4 Ferocity, his next basic ability consumes them to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Reaching 4 Ferocity with  Savagery or  Bola Strike locks them from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting. All Ferocity is lost after 10 seconds of being out of combat.

1.text: Innate: While in  brush, Rengar gains Unseen Predator.

2.text: Unseen Predator: Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to  leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal  melee range. This generates 1 Ferocity if Rengar had 0 Ferocity at one point. Unseen Predator lingers for 0.35 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts  Flash or  Hexflash to do so.Rengar can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

3.text: Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Scoring a  takedown against an enemy  champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Rengar a Trophy, once per unique champion and up to 5. An  additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On! Trophies grant 1% − 36% (based on  trophies) bonus AD as  bonus attack damage.

0.text: Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed. His next basic attack has an  uncancellable windup, gains  25 bonus range, and deals bonus physical damage, reduced by 40% against structures. This attack will  critically strike (not affected by critical strike damage) and the damage is increased by 0% − 66% (based on critical strike chance).

1.text: Ferocity Bonus: Savagery's damage is modified. Rengar gains 50% − 101% (based on level)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

2.text: Savagery  resets Rengar's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Rengar stores 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds as grey health on his health bar, increased to 100% of damage taken from  monsters.

1.text: Active: Rengar roars, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage to  monsters, and consuming his grey health to  heal for the same amount.

2.text: Ferocity Bonus: Battle Roar's damage is modified. Rengar  cleanses from all  crowd control.

0.text: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them for 1.75 seconds, as well as  revealing them for 2 seconds and granting  sight of a 150-unit radius around them for the same duration.

1.text: Ferocity Bonus: Bola Strike's damage is modified. The target is  rooted instead of  slowed.

0.text: Passive: Rengar also gains  Unseen Predator while  camouflaged from any source.

1.text: Active: Rengar prowls for a duration, gaining  bonus movement speed. After a 2-second delay, he also becomes  camouflaged.

2.text: During this time, Rengar will detect the nearest enemy champion in range,  revealing and gaining  sight of a 100-unit radius around them. Enemies detected are  revealed for the remaining full duration.

3.text: The nearest detected enemy within 1600 range is also marked, alerting all of their allies within 1200 range about Rengar's presence.

4.text: Rengar's next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy or with Unseen Predator to the marked enemy deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and inflicts  armor reduction for 4 seconds.

5.text: Attacking or casting abilities, other than  Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.
